name: Molten Wildebeest's Gizzard
flavorText: The gizzard of the molten wildebeest evinced such extraordinary properties when steeped in the correct mixture of alchemical reagents that the animals were hunted to extinction long ago.
flavorTextHtml: The gizzard of the molten wildebeest evinced such extraordinary properties when steeped in the correct mixture of alchemical reagents that the animals were hunted to extinction long ago.

secondary.textHtml: Regenerates 10,000 Life per Second. 10,000
